info.name: Berny23's YouTube Enhancements
info.description: Changes the big new thumbnails back to the old ones. Also reverts some other annoying changes.
info.additionalInfo:
v2.3
- fix search width when an album/artist is shown (dirty)

v2.2
- fix notification tumbnail width

v2.1
- fix playlist overlapping with left bar
- fix movie display in search results
- remove empty space on the left in windows with small width

v2.0
- small thumbnails in search
- fix search results offset and width

v1.0
- small thumbnails
- hides menu with small icons on the left side
- maybe some more features in the future...
